operations.summary: Queries features from the specified feature source

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Your MapGuide Session ID

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The FDO schema name

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The class name

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The FDO filter to apply

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of proprety names

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number of features to restrict this response to

parameters.name: transformto
parameters.description: The CS-Map coordinate system code to transform the resulting features into

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A comma-separated quartet (x1,y1,x2,y2) defining the spatial filter geometry

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: xml or json

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the number of results for the page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the page number of the page. You must specify a valid page size value (> 0) for this parameter to apply.

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Inserts one or more features into the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowInsert=1 in its resource header otherwise inserts will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Your MapGuide Session ID

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The FDO schema name

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The class name

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The Feature Set XML describing the features to be inserted

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
Feature Source is not configured to allow inserts
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Updates one or more features into the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowUpdate=1 in its resource header otherwise updates will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Your MapGuide Session ID

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The FDO schema name

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The class name

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The XML envelope describing the features to be update

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters
Session ID or MapGuide credentials not specified
Feature Source is not configured to allow updates
An error occurred during the operation

operations.summary: Deletes one or more features from the given feature class for the specified feature source. The Feature Source in question must have _MgRestAllowDelete=1 in its resource header otherwise deletes will be forbidden. If _MgRestUseTransaction=1 in the resource header, transactions will be used.

parameters.name: session
parameters.description: Your MapGuide Session ID

parameters.name: resourcePath
parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: schemaName
parameters.description: The FDO schema name

parameters.name: className
parameters.description: The class name

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The FDO filter determining what features to delete

responseMessages.message: You supplied a bad request due to one or more missing or invalid parameters

operations.summary: Queries features from the specified layer definition. Any hyperlink, tooltip and elevation expressions in the Layer Definition will be computed and returned in the response

parameters.description: The path of the resource ID

parameters.name: maxfeatures
parameters.description: The maximum number of features to restrict this response to

parameters.name: transformto
parameters.description: The CS-Map coordinate system code to transform the resulting features into

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A comma-separated quartet (x1,y1,x2,y2) defining the spatial filter geometry

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the number of results for the page. You cannot specify this parameter for CZML output

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Applies pagination on the query result. This specifies the page number of the page. You must specify a valid page size value (> 0) for this parameter to apply. You cannot specify this parameter for CZML output
